testing_tools: Burp Suite, Custom Python Scripts, Pytest
test_scenarios: ["Privilege Escalation","Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) for trips/invoices","Bypassing record rules (`ir.rule`)","Session fixation and hijacking"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical or high vulnerabilities related to authorization bypass.
reporting_requirements: Detailed vulnerability report with reproduction steps and risk rating.
trend_analysis: Number of authorization-related bugs should trend to zero.

test_scenarios: ["Scanning for hardcoded secrets in source code","Verifying deployment configurations mount secrets from AWS Secrets Manager","Ensuring no secrets are logged in plain text"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero hardcoded secrets in the codebase. All secrets are sourced from AWS Secrets Manager at runtime.
reporting_requirements: CI pipeline must fail if secrets are detected.
trend_analysis: Number of detected secrets must be zero at all times.

test_scenarios: ["Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) on all input fields","SQL Injection on API endpoints","Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) on integrations with external APIs"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical or high vulnerabilities in the DAST report.
reporting_requirements: ZAP scan report attached to weekly quality summary.
trend_analysis: Number of new DAST findings should decrease over time.
